message.name: ERR_CURRENCYEXCHANGE_DRE_CURRENT_TO_DATE
message.locale: Another rate for currency type %1s after date %2d is defined. Please set current To Date not later than %3d.

message.name: ERR_CURRENCYEXCHANGE_DRE_DATES
message.locale: A currency exchange rate value for defined period is already set.

message.name: ERR_CURRENCYEXCHANGE_DRE_PREVIOUS_TO_DATE
message.locale: Another rate for currency type %1s is still valid. Please set End Date of previously defined rate for currency type %2s less than current From Date.

message.name: ERR_CURRENCYEXCHANGE_MRE_PERIOD_TYPE
message.locale: Rate is already set for %1s currency type in specified period.
